functions.name: and
functions.description: Bitwise AND all the inputs together. If using lists of numbers it will return a list applying the other lists or scalar values to it.

functions.name: or
functions.description: Bitwise OR all the inputs together. If using lists of numbers it will return a list applying the other lists or scalar values to it.

functions.name: xor
functions.description: Bitwise XOR all the inputs together. If using lists of numbers it will return a list applying the other lists or scalar values to it.
